body: Just felt like thanking all the creators of the new update. It is real nice. I was thirsty for some SG, and we finally got it. The only thing that I felt was needed was that for 1.7-1.8 both allowed? I personally don't like 1.8. If you guys don't want to fix it, that is fine and I will deal with it. Otherwise, thanks! :)
